text:
My parents left their
homes to start a new life

I left that country to make an
impact where more is needed.

For my life, my purpose
is to foster connections

across borders, to speak up,
and to give voice to those

I want to bring
financial inclusion

to the four billion people
in today's informal economy.

I want to purposefully
invest in people

with ideas that change
global and local communities.

I want to create a future where
fewer people leave their homes

for the reasons my family
did, and more people

choose to do so for
the reasons I did.

Most importantly, I want to be
a reliable father, husband, son,

And to myself, I promise
to live purposefully

and to let curiosity
and happiness guide me.
